# outline-mcp documentation corpus

This static docs site is exported for Cloudflare Pages.
It contains user-facing guides for:

- Installation and runtime setup
- MCP client integration
- Permission model and safety
- Multi-agent operation patterns
- Tool references and troubleshooting

## Canonical root
/en

## Main docs entries
/en/docs
/en/docs/users/getting-started
/en/docs/users/installation
/en/docs/users/mcp-client-setup
/en/docs/users/configuration
/en/docs/users/multi-agent-operations
/en/docs/users/permission-model
/en/docs/users/tool-reference
/en/docs/users/testing-and-e2e
/en/docs/users/troubleshooting

## Korean docs entries
/ko/docs
/ko/docs/users/getting-started
/ko/docs/users/installation
/ko/docs/users/mcp-client-setup
/ko/docs/users/configuration
/ko/docs/users/multi-agent-operations
/ko/docs/users/permission-model
/ko/docs/users/tool-reference
/ko/docs/users/testing-and-e2e
/ko/docs/users/troubleshooting
